name: Pry Bar
description: Suburban home front porch at night, viewed from an elevated vantage point near the door. Person using a pry bar to attempt forced entry. Metal tool visible, leveraging against door frame. Static viewpoint, IR-tinted footage quality. Real-time speed, natural fluid motion at 1x playback rate.
